text: bhisaniyuntakkikkeantum, allahuvinre margattil ninn atil visvasiccavare tatannukeantum at (a margam) vakramayirikkan agrahiccukeantum ninnal patakalilellam irikkukayum arutâ€Œ. ninnal ennattil kuravayirunnittum ninnalkk avan vard'dhanav nalkiyat orkkukayum nasakarikalute paryavasanam ennaneyayirunnuvenn neakkukayum ceyyuka
